textBeforeTable: 3M Scotch-Weld DP-420 Eopxy adhesive is a high performance adhesive for bonding a wide variety of substrates (ie. stainless steel to stainless steel) with outstanding levels of reliability and durability. Provides high peel and shear strength, has controlled flow, a 20-30 minute worklife and a 2:1 mix ratio. Room cures to over 4000 PSI in overlap shear strength. Unique toughened formula for impact resistance. Use with 3M EPX Plus II Applicator 3M Scotch-Weld DP-420 Epoxy Adhesive 3M Scotch-Weld Low Odor Acrylic Adhesive DP-810NS requires minimal surface prep for bonding metal hinges into awning frames: reaches handling strength in 10 minutes. EA. 3M EPX Plus II Square Mixing Nozzle EPX-SQUARENOZZLE EA.
textAfterTable: 3M Scotch-Weld DP460 Epoxy Adhesive 3M Scotch-Weld DP 460 Epoxy Adhesive Off-White is a high performance, two-part epoxy adhesive offering outstanding shear and peel adhesive, and very high levels of durability. This adhesive has controlled flow, a 2:1 mix ratio, a 60-80 minute work life, and develops handling strength in 1-2 hours. Packaged in convenient Duo-Pak cartridges designed for use with the 3M EPX Plus II Applicator. 3M EPX Plus II Applicator and 2:1 mixing nozzle are required for proper dispensing of adhesive. Each sold seperately. CRIPTION SIZE/DESCRIPTION QTY   DP460-1.25OZ-WHT Scotch-Weld Epoxy Adhesive DP460 Off-White, 37ml, 1.25 fl oz., EPX Plus II Applicator needed
